title: Understanding Legends
text: Legends are essential components of charts that help in identifying different data series or categories. They provide a visual guide to the colors, patterns, or symbols used in the chart.

title: Purpose of Legends
text: Think about how legends help in distinguishing between different elements in a chart. They are crucial for understanding what each part of the chart represents.

hintAnswer: to allow line charts to identify which event each line represents
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Consider the role of legends in line charts. What do they help identify?
choices: to allow line charts to identify which event each line represents
to allow line charts to differentiate events
to allow a pie chart to differentiate between choices
to allow a bar chart to track changes over time
